data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Tivat, Montenegro.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tivat, Montenegro
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, please provide elders whose hearts are completely yours in every town in the state of Tivat.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next week in Tivat, Montenegro.
data.prayer: Spirit, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, please defend the 40 believers in Tivat against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Tivat, Montenegro.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Egyptian, Balkan people.
Jesus, please send your Spirit to Tivat, so they can have freedom.
data.verse: Now the Lord is the Spirit, and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Tivat, Montenegro find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tivat, Montenegro has a population of 15,300.

We estimate Tivat has 40 people who might know Jesus, 11,321 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 3,938 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 382 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Tivat, Montenegro so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.
